channel.title: An good quest system?
channel.description: Hey. I've got alot of bugs with the deltascape quest system when i try it at devolution 9.3 (no errors but bugs). So anyone know a better quest system for Devolution 9.3 or if you can help me with bugs or anything please add jarnodag@hotmail.com please.

item.title: An good quest system?
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

[quote=“lolwut69, post:4, topic:256157”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=338402.msg2625942#msg2625942 date=1231790639]
You could always make your own quest system.
[/quote]He doesn’t know enough about java to know how to make his own.[/quote] Sadly you’re right

item.title: An good quest system?
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

Yeah but how?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 02:11:06 pm[/size][hr] if(q1 == 0);
sendQuest(“Ghost’s Scare”, 7332);
if(q1 > 0);
sendQuest("@yel@Ghost’s Scare", 7332);
if(q1 == 15);
sendQuest("@gre@Ghost’s Scare", 7332);

Is my code and it shows green if i got 15, 2,1 or 0 q1 :s

Read full topic
